title: 【求助】服务器打不开！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
author: zyh1998616
txt_content:
打开就在这里卡住了，如图！！！！！

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
zyh1998616 发表于 2014-2-6 17:50
好了QAQ但是进去后显示
Connection lost
Failed to longin：bad login
用文本文档的方式打开server.properties。把online-mode=true改成online-mode=false

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content: 端口被占用，请尝试重启电脑

replies.author: zyh1998616
replies.txt_content:
wwpzxp 发表于 2014-2-6 17:36
端口被占用，请尝试重启电脑
好了QAQ但是进去后显示
Connection lost
Failed to longin：bad login
怎么破QAQ

replies.author: zyh1998616
replies.txt_content:
wwpzxp 发表于 2014-2-6 17:53
用文本文档的方式打开server.properties。把online-mode=true改成online-mode=false
谢谢爱你！已解决QWQ！！！
